olist-customerpickupdo-19: Scan all of the parcels by placing each parcel label in the frame. Click on the scan frame again.
title-4-whatiscounter-1: What is the Amazon Counter Service?
title-4-customerpickupdo-6: What if I have scan issues?
title-4-driverdeliverynotamazon-5:
<< IMPORTANT: The following section related to 3rd Party Deliveries does not apply to SA, UAE, MX, JP, DE, UK>> 

What if the driver is not from Amazon?
text-fqa-15: parcels will expire after 7 days, please allow a couple days for the driver to pick up. Please contact Amazon support, by clicking on the ‘?’ (upper right), scroll down at the end of the help page if a parcel is not picked up within 3 days
olist-driverdeliverynotamazon-2: Please scan parcels within 30 min. after delivery. Click on "Scan deliveries now".
olist-customerpickupscanissues-3: Click on the size description of the parcel (e.g. “small size”) instead of the scanframe.
olist-driverdeliverybusy-11: The driver needs to scan the QR code before handing you the parcels. Please do not ignore the driver and try to retrive the QR code as fast as possible.
title-4-driverpickupmissing-9: What if the parcel is missing?
olist-customerpickupscanissues-2: Click on “Enter Code” to enter the 6-digit pickup code instead of scanning the barcode. Please click on the screen.
title-3-driverpickup-3:
<<IMPORTANT: The following section does not apply to MX, SA, UAE>>

Driver Pickup
olist-customerpickupmissing-25: Follow the regular procedure for costumer pickup.
olist-support-43: If you want to see the tracking ID, you can click on the name of the customer. The tracking ID as well as the parcel ID is displayed.
title-4-driverdeliveryissues-4: What if there is a scan issue?
olist-driverdeliveryscanissue-2: Please show the driver the 6-digit numeric code above the QR code.
text-fqa-16: Please follow the regular process for customer pickup as outlined above.
olist-driverdeliverynotamazon-4:
Store parcels in a secure and organized place to ensure easy retrieval when the customer arrives.

------
bluetext-4: What should I do if a customer does not have a pickup notification?
olist-customerpickupscanissues-1: Select “Customer pickup” in the home screen.
olist-support-42: Click on ‘Sync’ to update the status of the current parcels.
text-fqa-10: If the customer cannot find their pickup notification offer the following tips: Check email: The pickup code will be in an email from “Delivery notifications”. Get support: Have the customer reach out to customer service by selecting Contact Us on the Amazon website or Amazon mobile app. An Amazon customer service representative can resend the pickup code when the customer can verify their account.
olist-driverpickupmissing-32: Select the parcel that is missing below and click on the parcel.
bluetext-10: What if the customer doesn’t want a parcel?
title-4-customerpickupdo-5: What do I do? Please test the following steps on the Amazon app below:
olist-keylearnings-2: Keep your opening hours up to date so customers and drivers know when to visit.
bluetext-6: What if the app isn’t working?
text-driverdelivery-2: Customers will select your location for pick up at checkout then a driver will deliver those parcels to your location. When driver arrives show him the QR code. The driver will scan the packaes. The customer will have 7 days to pick up the parcel.
olist-driverpickupdo-28: If parcels expire, a notification will appear on the main screen.
text-fqa-8: If possible, do not scan in the damaged parcel and reject it by giving it back to the driver. The driver will return the parcel to the depot and the customer will receive a refund.
bluetext-2: What if the carrier is attempting to deliver a parcel that appears damaged?
olist-keylearnings-3: Make sure your device is charged, connected to Wi-Fi and always in your reach.
olist-driverdeliverybusy-10: The driver can only wait for a limited time for you to show the QR code.
olist-driverpickupdo-30:
If a driver arrives, select “Driver pickup” from the home screen. Find the parcels named on the list and hand them to the driver.

------
olist-customerpickupmissing-27: You can choose to “unable to find” or “reject”.
title-4-driverdeliverydo-2: What do I do once I receive a parcel? Please test the following steps listed below on the Amazon App:
title-4-driverpickupdo-8: What do I do? Please test the following steps on the Amazon app below:
olist-support-36: The screen will display helpful advice and explanations on the services.
text-fqa-7:
Please contact Amazon support, by clicking on the ‘?’ (upper right), scroll down to the end
 of the help page and request support.
bluetext-5: What if the device is lost, stolen or broken?
bluetext-8: What if I have expired parcels waiting for the carrier to pick up for several days?
olist-customerpickupmissing-26: Now click on the displayed parcel size (e.g. “small size”).
olist-driverpickupmissing-31: Tap on the reminder to scan in expired parcels (customer abandoned parcels).
text-support-5: To support the in-store operation of Amazon Hub Counter, Amazon has a Store Support Line to assist you with Application, Device and Delivery issues.
olist-driverdeliverydo-6: Select “Driver delivery” from the home screen and choose Amazon.
olist-driverdeliverydo-9: Store parcels in a secure and organized place to ensure easy retrieval when the customer arrives.
olist-customerpickupdo-17: Scan the customer pickup barcode. Now information about the parcel appears.
text-fqa-12: Please contact your Amazon Hub Counter contact person for the program.
title-4-customerpickupmissing-7: What if the parcel is missing or the customer does not want the parcel?
olist-inventory-40: Click on the icon on the top left on the menu.
text-title-1: The Amazon Hub Counter Service allows your location to offer customers a new way to receive their orders. Here you’ll learn how to use the App, how to get support and how to provide a best-in-class service to your customers. This platform is also valid for web app users.
olist-customerpickupscanissues-6: If issues remain, please check whether your phone is connected to the network (not on airplane mode), click on the flash-symbol if the environment is too dark and double check the scanned codes. If this does not work, please contact support as outlined below (“How to get support”).
bluetext-3: Do I need to check customer ID?
olist-customerpickupdo-18: Retrieve the available parcels for the customer as shown in the list and select “Scan parcels”.
olist-keylearnings-1: Show the driver the displayed QR code on your counter device
olist-driverdeliverydo-7: Please show the driver the displayed QR code.
text-fqa-17: After scannning the costumer's pickup code, click on the parcel they would like to reject. Follow the prompts in the app to help the costumer understand next steps.
olist-support-39: Enter your phone number and click on ‘Call me now’.
bluetext-1: I forgot my username and password, what do I do?
olist-driverpickupmissing-34: Confirm that you cannot find the parcel by clicking on ‘Okay’.
olist-inventory-41: If you click on ‘Inventory’, you can see the current amount of parcels in your store
olist-driverdeliveryscanissue-1: The driver might encounter issues when scanning the QR code.
olist-customerpickupdo-20: Now hand all the parcels to the customer.
olist-support-37: Scroll through the Q&As to learn more
text-customerpickup-3: An Amazon customer will arrive at the store to pick up or retrieve their parcel(s). The customer will show a notification, which includes 1) a barcode and 2) a 6-digit numeric code. You need to scan the barcode, find the parcel and scan the parcel before handing it to the customer. You need to scan each customer pickup code AND parcel. This will delete the parcel from your inventory and responsibility.
olist-driverdeliverynotamazon-1: Select “Driver delivery” from the home screen and choose "Other" if the driver is not from Amazon.
olist-driverdeliverydo-8: The driver will scan the QR code and hand you the parcels.
text-fqa-9: No, customers only need to present their pickup code to collect their parcels.
olist-driverpickupdo-29: Click on the notification and scan the parcels. You need to scan the expired parcels within 2 hours after the notification appears.Now wait until a driver arrives (usually 1-2 days).
bluetext-9: What if I have expired parcels waiting for the carrier to pick up, but the customer arrives to pickup the parcel?
text-fqa-13:
Please contact Amazon support, by clicking on the ‘?’ (upper right), scroll down to the end
 of the help page and request support.
olist-customerpickupscanissues-5: You can enter the parcel tracking ID manually. Now “Done” appears and you hand all the parcels to the customer.
olist-customerpickupdo-16: Select “Customer pickup” from the home screen.
text-driverpickup-4: If customers do not pickup their parcel within 7 days, the parcel expires. Then you need to request driver pickup. You need to scan parcels for driver pickup. Otherwise the App will block you from other tasks.A delivery driver will arrive at the retail store location to pick up parcels. You do not need to scan upon driver arrival - just hand the parcels to the driver.
olist-support-35: If you click on ‘?’ Amazon help is provided
olist-support-38: If you did not find adequate support, you can request a service call. Click on “Contact support".
